hadiths.text: Shu'ba narrated the hadith as reported by Jarir with the same chain of narrators with this addition:Pride and conceitedness is among the owners of the camels and tranquillity and sobriety is found amongst the owners of sheep

chapter.ara-name: باب تَفَاضُلِ أَهْلِ الإِيمَانِ فِيهِ وَرُجْحَانِ أَهْلِ الْيَمَنِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: People excel over one another in faith, and the superiority of the people of Yemen in faith
